headline.main: Harper Doubles and Singles, Nationals Beat Braves for Sweep
headline.print_headline: Harper Doubles and Singles, Nationals Beat Braves for Sweep

docs.snippet: Streaking slugger Bryce Harper doubled, singled and drove in another run — but didn't homer — as the Washington Nationals beat the Atlanta Braves 5-4 Sunday for a sweep of the three-game series....
docs.lead_paragraph: Streaking slugger Bryce Harper doubled, singled and drove in another run — but didn't homer — as the Washington Nationals beat the Atlanta Braves 5-4 Sunday for a sweep of the three-game series.

headline.main: New York Teen Chirico Earns USTA's French Open Wild Card
headline.print_headline: New York Teen Chirico Earns USTA's French Open Wild Card

docs.snippet: Louisa Chirico, an 18-year-old from Harrison, New York, earned a chance to make her Grand Slam main-draw debut at the French Open by claiming a wild-card berth via the U.S. Tennis Association....
docs.lead_paragraph: Louisa Chirico, an 18-year-old from Harrison, New York, earned a chance to make her Grand Slam main-draw debut at the French Open by claiming a wild-card berth via the U.S. Tennis Association.

headline.main: Pirates Slip Past Cards for 4-3 Victory
headline.print_headline: Pirates Slip Past Cards for 4-3 Victory

docs.snippet: Jung Ho Kang went 2 for 4 with a home run and two RBIs and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat the St. Louis Cardinals 4-3 Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jung Ho Kang went 2 for 4 with a home run and two RBIs and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat the St. Louis Cardinals 4-3 Sunday.

headline.main: Beltre, Rodriguez Carry Rangers to 2-1 Win Over Rays
headline.print_headline: Beltre, Rodriguez Carry Rangers to 2-1 Win Over Rays

docs.snippet: Adrian Beltre homered and drove in two runs, and Wandy Rodriguez gave the Texas Rangers a record-setting pitching performance Sunday in a 2-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adrian Beltre homered and drove in two runs, and Wandy Rodriguez gave the Texas Rangers a record-setting pitching performance Sunday in a 2-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays.

headline.main: Records: Thousands Too Injured to Enter Baltimore Jail
headline.print_headline: Records: Thousands Too Injured to Enter Baltimore Jail

docs.snippet: Newly released records show that thousands of people have been brought to the Baltimore city jail in recent years with injuries too severe for them to be admitted....
docs.lead_paragraph: Newly released records show that thousands of people have been brought to the Baltimore city jail in recent years with injuries too severe for them to be admitted.

headline.main: Levine Conducts First Double Bill At Met Opera Since 2005

docs.snippet: James Levine conducted his 50th doubleheader at the Met Opera, and his first after being sidelined with a spine injury....
docs.abstract: James Levine conducted his 50th doubleheader at the Met Opera, and his first after being sidelined with a spine injury.

headline.main: Cuba's faithful joyous over Castro's papal visit
headline.sub: Cuba's faithful joyous over Castro's papal visit

docs.snippet: At a mass in Havana, Cuba's faithful lavish praise on Pope Francis after his private meeting at the Vatican with Cuban President Raul Castro. Mana Rabiee reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: At a mass in Havana, Cuba's faithful lavish praise on Pope Francis after his private meeting at the Vatican with Cuban President Raul Castro. Mana Rabiee reports.

headline.main: Hamilton Starts Rehab in Triple-A After 'Long, Ugly Process'
headline.print_headline: Hamilton Starts Rehab in Triple-A After 'Long, Ugly Process'

docs.snippet: Josh Hamilton is starting over, calling his return to baseball a "small miracle."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton is starting over, calling his return to baseball a "small miracle."

headline.main: Beaten Hamilton Lives to Fight Another Day
headline.print_headline: Beaten Hamilton Lives to Fight Another Day

docs.snippet: Lewis Hamilton lived to fight another day after Sunday's Spanish Grand Prix turned into a damage limitation exercise for the Formula One championship leader....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton lived to fight another day after Sunday's Spanish Grand Prix turned into a damage limitation exercise for the Formula One championship leader.

headline.main: Parma 'Disgusted' by Alleged Napoli Comments as Tempers Flare
headline.print_headline: Parma 'Disgusted' by Alleged Napoli Comments as Tempers Flare

docs.snippet: Relegated Parma accused Napoli of belittling their side and expecting an easy win after battling to a 2-2 draw in Serie A on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Relegated Parma accused Napoli of belittling their side and expecting an easy win after battling to a 2-2 draw in Serie A on Sunday.
